command: execute @s[scores={mobspear=54..57}] ~~~ execute @e[r=1,type=yes:amethyst_spear_entityc] ~~~ scoreboard players set @e[type=husk,c=1,r=5.5,scores={mobspear=54..57}] mobspear 58
execute as @s[scores={mobspear=54},tag=!mob_spear_attacking] at @s if entity @a[r=5.5] run summon yes:amethyst_spear_entityc
execute as @s[scores={mobspear=54..57}] at @s if entity @e[r=1,type=yes:amethyst_spear_entityc] run scoreboard players set @s mobspear 58
execute as @s[scores={mobhammer=23},tag=!mob_hammer_attacking] at @s if entity @a[r=4.5] run summon yes:copper_hammer_attack_entityc
execute as @s[scores={mobhammer=23..26}] at @s if entity @e[r=1,type=yes:copper_hammer_attack_entityc] run scoreboard players set @s mobhammer 27
execute as @s[scores={mobbattleaxe=46}] at @s if entity @a[r=4.5] run summon yes:battleaxe_entity2c
execute as @s[scores={mobbattleaxe=46..49}] at @s if entity @e[r=1,type=yes:battleaxe_entity2c] run scoreboard players set @s mobbattleaxe 50
execute as @s[scores={mobstaff=127}] at @s if entity @a[r=8] run summon yes:staff_hit_entityc
execute as @s[scores={mobstaff=127}] at @s if entity @a[r=8] run summon yes:staff_random_entityc
execute as @s[scores={mobstaff=127..129}] at @s if entity @e[r=4,type=yes:staff_hit_entityc] run scoreboard players set @s mobstaff 130
